recipesJson.name: Nanner Puddin'
recipesJson.author: SweetLou22
recipesJson.description: Sweet and thick inhale, with a nice fluffy banana cream finish. The name says it all! It's Grandmaw's Nanner Puddin! Definitely needs at least a 3 day steep, great flavor even at max VG. Hope you guys enjoy! Check out my other recipes!

reviews.text:
Just mixed this up. Thanks for the nice easy recipe. I like it a lot so far. 
I'll come back and add a star if needed in a few days.
